tool_description: TrustCheckr Phone Risk API helps you to understand the risk associated with the phone number. Risk score will help you onboard customers faster with lowest fraud rates
name: TrustCheckr Phone Risk Score - India
title: TrustCheckr Phone Risk Score - India

api_list.name: TrustCheckr Phone Risk API
api_list.description: We need country code and phone number. Currently works for India Phone Numbers only
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trustcheckr-phone-risk-score-india.p.rapidapi.com/risk/phonerisk/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trustcheckr-phone-risk-score-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
